{"id":305935165,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 years, 6 months","timestamp":1582426091,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/305935165/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"13.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def trap(self, height: List[int]) -> int:\n        l, r = 0, len(height) - 1\n        l_max, r_max = 0, 0\n        ans = 0\n        while l <= r:\n            if height[l] < height[r]:\n                if height[l] < l_max:\n                    ans += (l_max - height[l])\n                else:\n                    l_max = height[l]\n                l += 1\n            else:\n                if height[r] < r_max:\n                    ans += (r_max - height[r])\n                else:\n                    r_max = height[r]\n                r -= 1\n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
